description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Emergency training for jet pilots; new buildings and roadworks in West Berlin; Chancellor Dr Kiesinger visits India and Pakistan; textile and other industries of Sindelfingen, near Stuttgart; electronic computer manufacture; 50th anniversary of the Arri camera works in Munich; Icon Museum in Rechlinghausen, Ruhr; paintings of Friedrich Gerlach; Christmas Fair in Nuremberg; International women's trampoline contest in Kiel.
